Functional Developer

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference

Library Reference

Version 2.0

This reference manual covers the following Dylan libraries: SQL-ODBC, ODBC-FFI, DUIM-OLE-Server, DUIM-OLE-Control, OLE-Automation, OLE-Server, OLE- Control-Framework, OLE, COM, and OLE-Dialogs.
